section.name: Learning Activities
section.summary:
Learning Activities

Begin by taking the Precourse Assessment. Read the WIOA definition of Career Pathway. Then, review Units 1-5 to successfully complete both Learning Checks to generate a certificate of course completion. 

You will see automatically receive a checkmark in the Progress Tracker when you complete a Learning Check. You may track your progress with each unit by manually checking off each one as you complete it.
